instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE,' then tap About . Tap Software information . View the Software number . Review the information in the Review software version details section below.

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE,' then tap About . Tap Software information . View the Software number . Review the information in the Review software version details section below.

From the Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap About . Tap Software update . Tap Check Now and follow the on-screen prompts. This is a large update and may take 20 minutes or more to download and install.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Camera . Tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap the Camera Settings icon. Adjust the desired settings.
From any home screen, tap Apps. Tap Camera . Tap Settings . Select the Settings tab . Scroll down to and tap Storage . Select the storage location: Device Memory card
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Gallery . Tap the MORE icon. Tap Edit Tap each picture (or album, if applicable) to be deleted. Tap DELETE . Tap DELETE .

Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 1 1 Open Facebook. Tap the Facebook app, which resembles a white "f" on a blue background. Doing so will open your News Feed if you're already logged into Facebook. If you aren't already logged into Facebook, enter your email address (or phone number) and password to continue. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 2 2 Go to the page of the person whom you want to report. Tap the search bar at the top of the screen, type in the name of the person you want to report, tap their name, and then tap their profile image. Alternatively, locate and tap their name in your News Feed. You can also report business or celebrity pages, though the report options will differ slightly. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 3 3 Tap . This option is near the top of the user's page, just below and to the right of their name. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 4 4 Tap . It's in the pop-up menu. Doing so brings up another menu with reporting options. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 5 5 Select a reason for reporting the profile. Tap one of the following options in the menu: Pretending to Be Someone Fake Account Fake Name Posting Inappropriate Things I Want to Help Something Else Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 6 6 Select follow-up details if necessary. If you selected either the Pretending to Be Someone option or the I Want to Help option, do the following: Pretending to Be Someone Tap Me , A Friend , or Celebrity in the "Who are they pretending to be?" section. I Want to Help Tap a reason (e.g., Suicide or Harassment ) in the "Can you give us some more details?" section. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 7 7 Tap . It's a blue button at the bottom of the screen. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 8 8 Tap when prompted. Doing so confirms that your report was sent. Advertisement

Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 9 1 Open Facebook. Go to https://www.facebook.com/ in your computer's web browser. This will open your News Feed if you're already logged into Facebook. If you aren't already logged into Facebook, enter your email address (or phone number) and password in the upper-right side of the page before continuing. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 10 2 Go to the page of the person whom you want to report. Click the search bar at the top of the screen, type in the name of the person you want to report, click their name, and then click their profile image. Alternatively, locate and click their name in your News Feed. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 11 3 Click . It's nestled in the bottom-right corner of the cover photo at the top of their profile page. Doing so prompts a drop-down menu. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 12 4 Click . It's in the pop-up menu. This opens a window with various reporting options. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 13 5 Select a reason for reporting the profile. Click one of the following options in the window: Pretending to Be Someone Fake Account Fake Name Posting Inappropriate Things I Want to Help Something Else Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 14 6 Select follow-up details if necessary. If you selected either the Pretending to Be Someone option or the I Want to Help option, do the following: Pretending to Be Someone Tap Me , A Friend , or Celebrity in the "Who are they pretending to be?" section. I Want to Help Tap a reason (e.g., Suicide or Harassment ) in the "Can you give us some more details?" section. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 15 7 Click . This blue button is in the bottom-right corner of the window. Image titled Report Someone on Facebook Step 16 8 Click when prompted. This confirms that your report has been sent. Advertisement
